snippet.title: A Long Road Home - Gameplay Trailer 3
snippet.description:
A Long Road Home, One Bit Studio's point and click adventure is now available on Steam and itch.io.

Embark on a journey with a young man, who desperately tries to reunite with his family. Little does he know that to reach his goal and find his loved ones, he has to a face merciless tyrant .

Explore mystical locations and solve interesting puzzles in this new adventure game.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/01bitstudio
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/01bitstudio/
